Nunu"},{"lineNumber":110598,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだぁ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"What the heck!?"},{"lineNumber":110599,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、だって……貴方……ﾇﾇﾇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, it's just... you... Nunu"},{"lineNumber":110600,"originalJapaneseLine":"「っっっ、はぁぁぁ〜〜〜〜〜。ﾇﾇﾇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Haaahhhh... I won't lose to you! Nunu"},{"lineNumber":110605,"originalJapaneseLine":"「〜♪　ﾇﾇﾇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"~♪ Nunu"},{"lineNumber":110606,"originalJapaneseLine":"城の中庭を散歩していたメガフォースに、","translatedEnglishLine":"To Megaforce, who was taking a walk in the castle courtyard,"},{"lineNumber":110607,"originalJapaneseLine":"突然大声がかけられた。","translatedEnglishLine":"a sudden loud voice called out."},{"lineNumber":110608,"originalJapaneseLine":"「メガフォース、危ねぇ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Megaforce, watch out!"},{"lineNumber":110609,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Huh?"},{"lineNumber":110610,"originalJapaneseLine":"宙を舞う野球ボールが、メガフォースの頭に","translatedEnglishLine":"A flying baseball came aimed directly at Megaforce's head,"},{"lineNumber":110611,"originalJapaneseLine":"まるで吸い込まれるように飛んできた。","translatedEnglishLine":"as if being sucked in."},{"lineNumber":110612,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":110613,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　＜スコーン！＞","translatedEnglishLine":"*Skoooon!*"},{"lineNumber":110614,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わあ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Wah!?"},{"lineNumber":110615,"originalJapaneseLine":"甲高い音を立てて野球ボールが宙に舞い上がり、","translatedEnglishLine":"The baseball soared into the air with a high-pitched sound,"},{"lineNumber":110616,"originalJapaneseLine":"落ちてきたところをパシッとキャッチ。","translatedEnglishLine":"and was caught with a slap as it came down."},{"lineNumber":110617,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んー？　これは確か……","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm? This is definitely..."},{"lineNumber":110618,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ヤキュウボール、って奴だったか？　ﾇﾇﾇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"a baseball, wasn't it? Nunu"},{"lineNumber":110619,"originalJapaneseLine":"「すすす、すみません、大丈夫ですかー！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"S-s-sorry, are you okay!?"},{"lineNumber":110620,"originalJapaneseLine":"「このくらいどってことない。","translatedEnglishLine":"This much is nothing."},{"lineNumber":110621,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それより気をつけろよ。ﾇﾇﾇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"More importantly, be careful. Nunu"},{"lineNumber":110622,"originalJapaneseLine":"機嫌を悪くした様子もなく、","translatedEnglishLine":"Without seeming upset,"},{"lineNumber":110623,"originalJapaneseLine":"メガフォースはボールを投げ返した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Megaforce threw the ball back."},{"lineNumber":110624,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、はいー、すみませんでしたー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Y-yes, sorry about that!"},{"lineNumber":110625,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おうー。ﾇﾇﾇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh, okay. Nunu"},{"lineNumber":110626,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"........"},{"lineNumber":110627,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん？　いたのか。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm? You were here."},{"lineNumber":110628,"originalJapaneseLine":"　てか、なんだよその目は？　ﾇﾇﾇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"And what’s with those eyes? Nunu"},{"lineNumber":110629,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前らの皮膚ってなんでそんな固いんだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Why is your skin so hard?"},{"lineNumber":110630,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、こりゃこちらの星で言うところの、","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, this is what we call on this planet,"},{"lineNumber":110631,"originalJapaneseLine":"　外骨格-ｶﾞｲｺｯｶｸ-って奴だな。ﾇﾇﾇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"an exoskeleton. Nunu"},{"lineNumber":110632,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺達はお前らみたいに中に骨がない代わりに、","translatedEnglishLine":"Instead of having bones inside like you,"},{"lineNumber":110633,"originalJapaneseLine":"　外側が骨で覆われているんだよ。ﾇﾇﾇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"we have our bones covered on the outside. Nunu"},{"lineNumber":110634,"originalJapaneseLine":"メガフォースが誇らしげに、","translatedEnglishLine":"Megaforce proudly,"},{"lineNumber":110635,"originalJapaneseLine":"自分の腕をコンコンと叩いてみせた。","translatedEnglishLine":"tapped his own arm."},{"lineNumber":110636,"originalJapaneseLine":"「不思議な奴らめ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Strange creatures..."},{"lineNumber":110637,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふん、合理的と言え。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmph, you could call it rational."},{"lineNumber":110638,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ぶにぶにの肉を露出してるお前らの方が","translatedEnglishLine":"You're the strange ones, exposing your squishy flesh,"},{"lineNumber":110639,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺にはよっぽど不思議だよ。ﾇﾇﾇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I find that much stranger. Nunu"},{"lineNumber":110640,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これなら鎧となって","translatedEnglishLine":"With this, you have armor"},{"lineNumber":110641,"originalJapaneseLine":"　敵の攻撃もある程度防げるしな。ﾇﾇﾇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"that can somewhat defend against enemy attacks. Nunu"},{"lineNumber":110642,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま、俺らの方がお前らより","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, we're a much superior species compared to you!"},{"lineNumber":110643,"originalJapaneseLine":"　種族的によっぽど優れてるってことだ！　ﾇﾇﾇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Species-wise, that is! Nunu"},{"lineNumber":110644,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そんなアドバンテージがあっても","translatedEnglishLine":"Even with that advantage,"},{"lineNumber":110645,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前は俺に勝てんとは……これもまた不思議だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"you still can't beat me... that's also a mystery."},{"lineNumber":110646,"originalJapaneseLine":"「や、やかましい！　ﾇﾇﾇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"S-shut up! Nunu"},{"lineNumber":110647,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふっ！　はっ！　やあ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmpf! Ha! Hey!"},{"lineNumber":110648,"originalJapaneseLine":"中庭でメガフォースが槍を振り回していた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Megaforce was swinging his spear around in the courtyard."},{"lineNumber":110649,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おっ、なんだ修行か？","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh, what's this? Training?"},{"lineNumber":110650,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ふふん、無駄な努力だな","translatedEnglishLine":"Heh, a futile effort."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 向こうの迷惑になっちゃうしね。ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It would end up being a bother to them, you know. Nunu

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいのよ、ちょっとお話して、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's fine, just a little chat,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 顔を合わせたら挨拶する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and when we meet face to face, just a greeting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その程度で私は十分幸せです。ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's enough for me to be happy. Nunu

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……なんでだ？」
「っっっ、はぁぁぁ〜〜〜〜〜。ﾇﾇﾇ」
「なんだぁ！？」
「いや、だって……貴方……ﾇﾇﾇ」
「っっっ、はぁぁぁ〜〜〜〜〜。ﾇﾇﾇ」
「なんなんだ！！」
メガワスは故郷から遠く離れた地で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Megawas had found a modest happiness

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ささやかな幸せを手に入れた。
「ランス！　お前には負けんぞ！　ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance! I won't lose to you! Nunu

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「〜♪　ﾇﾇﾇ」
城の中庭を散歩していたメガフォースに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To Megaforce, who was taking a walk in the castle courtyard,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 突然大声がかけられた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a sudden loud voice called out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「メガフォース、危ねぇ！」
宙を舞う野球ボールが、メガフォースの頭に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A flying baseball came aimed directly at Megaforce's head,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まるで吸い込まれるように飛んできた。
＜スコーン！＞
甲高い音を立てて野球ボールが宙に舞い上がり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The baseball soared into the air with a high-pitched sound,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 落ちてきたところをパシッとキャッチ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and was caught with a slap as it came down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んー？　これは確か……
ヤキュウボール、って奴だったか？　ﾇﾇﾇ」
「すすす、すみません、大丈夫ですかー！？」
「このくらいどってことない。
それより気をつけろよ。ﾇﾇﾇ」
機嫌を悪くした様子もなく、
メガフォースはボールを投げ返した。
「は、はいー、すみませんでしたー！」
「おうー。ﾇﾇﾇ」
「ん？　いたのか。
てか、なんだよその目は？　ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And what’s with those eyes? Nunu

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前らの皮膚ってなんでそんな固いんだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why is your skin so hard?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、こりゃこちらの星で言うところの、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, this is what we call on this planet,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 外骨格-ｶﾞｲｺｯｶｸ-って奴だな。ﾇﾇﾇ」
「俺達はお前らみたいに中に骨がない代わりに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Instead of having bones inside like you,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 外側が骨で覆われているんだよ。ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we have our bones covered on the outside. Nunu

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メガフォースが誇らしげに、
自分の腕をコンコンと叩いてみせた。
「不思議な奴らめ……」
「ふん、合理的と言え。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmph, you could call it rational.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぶにぶにの肉を露出してるお前らの方が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're the strange ones, exposing your squishy flesh,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺にはよっぽど不思議だよ。ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I find that much stranger. Nunu

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これなら鎧となって
敵の攻撃もある程度防げるしな。ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that can somewhat defend against enemy attacks. Nunu

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、俺らの方がお前らより
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, we're a much superior species compared to you!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 種族的によっぽど優れてるってことだ！　ﾇﾇﾇ」
「そんなアドバンテージがあっても
お前は俺に勝てんとは……これもまた不思議だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you still can't beat me... that's also a mystery.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「や、やかましい！　ﾇﾇﾇ」
「ふっ！　はっ！　やあ！」
中庭でメガフォースが槍を振り回していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Megaforce was swinging his spear around in the courtyard.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おっ、なんだ修行か？
ふふん、無駄な努力だな

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

てか、なんだよその目は？　ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And what’s with those eyes? Nunu

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前らの皮膚ってなんでそんな固いんだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why is your skin so hard?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、こりゃこちらの星で言うところの、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, this is what we call on this planet,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 外骨格-ｶﾞｲｺｯｶｸ-って奴だな。ﾇﾇﾇ」
「俺達はお前らみたいに中に骨がない代わりに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Instead of having bones inside like you,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 外側が骨で覆われているんだよ。ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we have our bones covered on the outside. Nunu

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メガフォースが誇らしげに、
自分の腕をコンコンと叩いてみせた。
「不思議な奴らめ……」
「ふん、合理的と言え。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmph, you could call it rational.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぶにぶにの肉を露出してるお前らの方が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're the strange ones, exposing your squishy flesh,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺にはよっぽど不思議だよ。ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I find that much stranger. Nunu

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これなら鎧となって
敵の攻撃もある程度防げるしな。ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that can somewhat defend against enemy attacks. Nunu

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、俺らの方がお前らより
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, we're a much superior species compared to you!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 種族的によっぽど優れてるってことだ！　ﾇﾇﾇ」
「そんなアドバンテージがあっても
お前は俺に勝てんとは……これもまた不思議だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you still can't beat me... that's also a mystery.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「や、やかましい！　ﾇﾇﾇ」
「ふっ！　はっ！　やあ！」
中庭でメガフォースが槍を振り回していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Megaforce was swinging his spear around in the courtyard.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おっ、なんだ修行か？
ふふん、無駄な努力だな
